returns.content_html:
Return & Refund Policy

You can return products within 14 days of receipt for a refund or exchange, provided they are in their unused, in original condition and wrapped packaging. 

For returns or exchanges due to manufacturing defects, the period is 30 days.

Refunds will be processed within 3â€“10 business days after we receive and inspect the returned shipment. Bank transaction fees may be deducted in some cases.

If the returned product is found to be used or not in its original condition, it will be sent back to the customer and the refund will be rejected.

BabyIslandEG will bear the cost of return shipping only in the following cases:

  • The product has a manufacturing defect.
  • The product's specifications do not match the description on our website.
  • For any other reasons, the customer is responsible for return shipping costs.

Certain items may be non-returnable for hygiene reasons, including but not limited to diapers, Baby potty, Bottles, Internal clothes, Care supplies, Feeding supplies, Discounted items.

Terms and Conditions for Babyislandeg

**Last Updated: 5/2/2024

Welcome to Babyislandeg. By accessing our website and making a purchase, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully before placing an order.

Definitions**

    1. "We", "us", "our" refers to Babyislandeg.
    2. "You", "your", "customer" refers to the individual or entity purchasing products from our website.

Acceptance of Terms**

By placing an order, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agreed to these Terms and Conditions.

Eligibility**

You must be at least 18 years old to make a purchase. By placing an order, you confirm that you meet this age requirement.

Product Information**

We strive to provide accurate product descriptions and images. However, we do not guarantee that the information is error-free, complete, or current. Therefore customers are required to contact us for any further clarification before shipping.

Slight variations in color or design may occur due to manufacturing differences or screen settings.

Pricing and Payment**

All prices are listed in Egyptian Pounds (EGP) and are subject to change without notice.

Prices mentioned on our website are the final prices and include all applicable taxes.

Payment must be made at the time of purchase through the available payment methods.

Accepted Payment Options:

  • Credit/Debit Cards
  • Meeza
  • Fawry
  • InstaPay
  • Cash on Delivery

Order Confirmation**

After placing an order, you will receive an email confirmation. This does not constitute acceptance of your order. We reserve the right to cancel any order for reasons including but not limited to product availability, errors in pricing, or suspicion of fraud.

Shipping and Delivery**

We aim to deliver your order within the specified timeframe. However, we are not responsible for delays caused by third-party carriers or unforeseen circumstances.

We deliver to most regions within Egypt. Standard delivery time is 2â€“7 business days. For faster delivery options, please contact us directly.

Shipping fees are calculated by the shipping company and are based on the volume and weight of the shipment.

BabyIslandEG pays extra fees to allow customers to open the shipment upon delivery to inspect for broken or missing parts, and to ensure the color and specifications match as ordered.

Customers are required to thoroughly check the shipment and inform us immediately of any issues.

Returns and Refunds**

You may return products within 14 days of receipt for a refund or exchange, provided they are in their unused, in original condition and wrapped packaging. 

For returns or exchanges due to manufacturing defects, the period is 30 days.

Refunds will be processed within 3â€“10 business days after we receive and inspect the returned shipment. Bank transaction fees may be deducted in some cases.

If the returned product is found to be used or not in its original condition, it will be sent back to the customer and the refund will be rejected.

BabyIslandEG will bear the cost of return shipping only in the following cases:

  • The product has a manufacturing defect.
  • The product's specifications do not match the description on our website.
  • For any other reasons, the customer is responsible for return shipping costs.

Certain items may be non-returnable for hygiene reasons, including but not limited to diapers, Baby potty, Bottles, Internal clothes, Care supplies, Feeding supplies, Discounted items.

Liability**

We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our products.

Customers must provide accurate and complete information during checkout. BabyIslandEG is not liable for issues arising from incorrect customer information.

Customers are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account login details.

Delivery delays caused by unforeseen circumstances or third-party shipping companies are beyond our control.

BabyIslandEG is not responsible for typographical errors, pricing inaccuracies, or technical issues on the website.

Intellectual Property**

All content on the BabyIslandEG website, including images, text, and design, is the property of BabyIslandEG.

Unauthorized use, reproduction, or distribution of our content is strictly prohibited.

Privacy Policy**

We are committed to protecting your privacy. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for information on how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

 Governing Law**

These Terms and Conditions are governed by the laws of the Arab Republic of Egypt. Any disputes arising from these terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Egyptian courts.

Amendments**

We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Your continued use of the site after any changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms and Conditions.

Contact Information**

For any questions or concerns regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at [email protected].

best-price.title: Best Price Guarantee
best-price.content_html:
Best Price Guarantee

At Baby Island, we know how expensive it can be to stay on top of your child's ever-changing needs. That's why we offer an unbeatable Best Price Guarantee. If you find any of our products for a lower price anywhere, we'll match itâ€”so you always get the best deal, with no doubt.


How do we make it happen? Simple! We cut out the middleman by buying directly from manufacturers and suppliers, and shipping products straight to you. No costly storefronts, no hidden fees, and no huge markups. Just the best products at the best prices.


Your satisfaction is our priority, Shop with confidence at Baby Island, where you'll always find the leading brands at the most competitive prices. Every time.
